text: One of the most hotly anticipated parts of a new Real Housewives season is the tagline reveal. Each Housewife's opening line helps set the tone, giving a glimpse of what the'Wife has been doing and how she's feeling about the season. With Season 10 of The Real Housewives of New York City underway, fans were excited to hear their favorite New Yorkers'new taglines â€” and they did not disappoint.
